name: HUNDRED FIRES: The rising of red star - EPISODE 3
name_original: HUNDRED FIRES: The rising of red star - EPISODE 3
description:
Hundred Fires is an action, stealth and infiltration game with an exciting story and incredible cinematics created by David Amado Fernández.

This is a one man infiltration mission, you alone cannot defeat the entire Soviet army, you must use your best skills to hide, sneak away from the enemy and go undetected.

You must use your infiltration skills, hide in remote places, not make noise, use different items to advance in your adventure, you will also find action moments, a variety of weapons and strategies to fulfill your mission

Get ready for the thrilling conclusion of the trilogy with "Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star - Episode III "!

Montenegro, the fearless protagonist, returns in his final mission to save his daughter Merche and put an end to the nightmare that has haunted his family for so long. In this epic conclusion, you'll once again immerse yourself in the intensity of infiltration, where every move and decision counts.

The challenges are as relentless as ever: you'll face enemy soldiers, seek cover, use the environment to your advantage, and solve clever puzzles. Tension is at its peak as you delve into a story filled with unexpected twists that will unravel all the mysteries that have kept players intrigued since the first episode.

"Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star - Episode III -" will push you to the limit as you dive into a world of espionage, intrigue, and tactical action. Can Montenegro rescue his daughter and finally put an end to the conspiracy that has haunted him?

Prepare for an exciting gaming experience that will keep you glued to the screen in this thrilling conclusion to the "Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star" trilogy.
